name: Mouseteroids
description:
Play the old arcade game Asteroids using your mouse and keyboard!

Originally uploaded to the Game Maker: Studio Steam Workshop in January of 2016 as Masteroids, it was bland and buggy. Now it's being re-released as Mouseteroids for the #RemakeJam, with completely redone visuals, and many gameplay upgrades.

Please leave any feedback or suggestions you may have in the comment section below (or as a review), thank you for checking this game out!

Link to the original version of the game, Masteroids:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=598817350
